title: Are the recent PBE skins part of this year's Harrowing?
body:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sdokngJsYSg/VgtQoU5_tsI/AAAAAAAAyMQ/h9lfjtrTfQs/s640/rx1zFZU.jpg

I was curious if these three skins are for this year's Harrowing event? Can someone clarify?

replies.body: When will the Halloween skins arrive to PBE?
Can you give us some clues about the skins ? about the theme ? or the models ?
They were released to PBE last night - the theme is Zombie/Slayer.

likely they'll be in either the next pbe cycle, which should start on tuesday/wednesday.

If not, it will almost certainly be the one after.

> [{quoted}](name=Krizalid,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LIc8Unza,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-10-12T18:37:38.734+0000)
>
> When will the Halloween skins arrive to PBE?

I'd like to say that at this point, it's obvious. Patch 5.20 is almost here so obviously not going to arrive on PBE near the end of 5.20 cycle. Patch is in 2 days, then Halloween is shortly after 2 weeks when 5.21 comes around. Sooo, should be later this week or next week on PBE. 5.21 cycle would be Harrowing stuff because end of October OP.
Can you give us some clues ?
Lissandra & Azir definitly should be in the harrowing theme
Nope. Hopefully we will see the Halloween skins tomorrow or wednesday *crosses fingers*
